i have this feeling that i‚Äôm inevitably going to kill myself i‚Äôm zander. i‚Äôm fifteen, a sophomore in high school. i always have this feeling that i‚Äôm just ultimately going to kill myself. the thing is, i‚Äôm terrified of life. it fucking scares me. growing up is fucking scary. and i‚Äôm growing up too fast, i feel. i‚Äôve been grappling with depression since the middle of eighth grade, kickstarted by an abusive relationship, and it has only gotten worse throughout the years. my grades in school have me barely getting by ever since, and they‚Äôve only gotten worse with this covid shit. this causes me to feel like a failure. i feel like a loser in comparison to everybody i know. i am stubborn as all hell and unmotivated as shit to do anything in school right now. so when they ask me to treat online school like normal school... when i haven‚Äôt seen my fucking friends, my primary motivator in school, for ten months... when my fucking teachers are getting swapped out left and right... when they load me with more work than i‚Äôve ever seen in my life, yeah, i‚Äôm gonna get pissed. i‚Äôm gonna say fuck you. when something doesn‚Äôt feel right, it may as well suck my dick. i hate it but that‚Äôs who i am.  i don‚Äôt know what career i want to pursue. i never have. no goals. i DO want to love. believe it or not, i have an extremely big heart. i was put on this earth to love somebody else, i believe. but without a job, nothing is possible. without job, no money. without money, no nothing. i hate that. if it were my world, i would be spending everyday with the person i love doing whatever i desire. that‚Äôs not the case, obviously. whatever the fuck we want. sounds like heaven, right?  i don‚Äôt think i was cut out to live this life. i‚Äôm too stubborn. a rebellious nature that i can‚Äôt control always has its grips on me. the only reason i haven‚Äôt killed myself yet is because i don‚Äôt want to harm my family. all of which i love, but certainly don‚Äôt like. they‚Äôre all kind of toxic people and annoy the fuck out of me. i probably am too. but the idea of inflicting so much pain upon my mom makes me sick. it‚Äôs not fair, and as ive said before, i don‚Äôt like to do not fair. i never asked to live, and really want to die. why should i feel bad about suicide? i don‚Äôt know. i almost resent my mom for bringing me onto this earth. i won‚Äôt watch myself become a sad and pathetic adult like my dad or aunt. i just know it‚Äôs gonna happen. life is fucking brutal, i know. i‚Äôve seen it. it‚Äôs scary. but i‚Äôm already becoming my worst fear: a sad and pathetic adult. i feel like i‚Äôd be happier dead. if reincarnation is a thing, hopefully i get lucky, or else i‚Äôll probably just kill myself again. if things just go black, shit, even better. i don‚Äôt ever have to exist again. i don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs next. but anything seems better than living on this earth. i wish things were different. i do. but i won‚Äôt let life destroy me the way it has everybody else. everybody is so sad. i‚Äôll fucking kill myself before i disappoint my fucking family who has done a GOOD job raising me and taking care of me. wish i could just let life fuck me in the ass like it does to everyone else but i cant. i want to die so bad. god i seriously want to die so fucking bad

First time I ever consider suicide Sorry for the long post.       I never considered suicide until last year, but I don't think I can go on much longer.        I'm from Lebanon, a small country in the Middle East. You may have heard about it in the news. This country that had an extraordinarily rich culture, perfect geography, and infinite potential, has turned to a literal hell hole in the span of a year and a half. And the worst is yet to come.           In 2019 I was 22, freshly graduated, and had my first job. I had moved out and started living independently, life was fucking great but I didn't realize it back then. I'll spare you the political and economical details unless someone is interested, but in October everything started turning to shit. The effects of decades of widespread corruption and sectarian division started to show, and the economy started going downhill.        I lost my job in January of 2020, along with a huge chunk of the population. I had to start financially relying on my parents again, which already took away what I enjoyed the most in my life: the fact I was finally a self-sufficient, responsible person. Then covid hit. And then on August 4th 2020, what some of you may know Lebanon for, happened.       The third biggest non-nuclear explosion in the history of mankind happened in the heart of Beirut, the capital. It created a shockwave that was felt all the way to Cyprus, a fucking ISLAND 200 kilometers away from Lebanon. Why? Because the government was so corrupt and negligent that thousands of tons of explosive chemicals were dangerously stored in a warehouse and caught fire.      Thankfully my family and I lived far enough from the explosion to suffer nothing but shattered windows, but I was a few hundred meters away from the blast when it happened. You can find footage of the explosion online, so I don't think I have to go in detail as to what happened. I knew my family were home so I didn't worry about them, but my grandpa lived even closer to the blast than I was, and phones were unusable. I started running towards his home, as I anticipated seeing him crushed by rubble.      The thought of describing what I saw that day, running through the city where I made my strongest friendships, found love, studied, graduated, and got into the professional world, already has me shaking and crying.     Entire houses and buildings I knew had turned into rubble. The road was a sea of glass, stone, and cement. Sirens, people shouting, screaming, crying, everywhere. I don't even want to think about how many dead people I ran by. I don't think anyone can even make a movie like this. I think I'm gonna stop talking about this.     Thankfully my grandpa only suffered minor injuries. I'm glad I wasn't the one to take him to the hospital because I don't think I could have taken it. I've heard stories and seen videos of destroyed hospitals, that were already crowded with covid cases, walls and floors covered in blood and doctors performing surgeries on the floor.       This was the last straw for Lebanon. In 2019, 1$ was equivalent to 1500 Lebanese pounds. Today, it's 13800, and increasing by the day. Medicine, fuel, electricity, and food are becoming less and less accessible. People are fighting in supermarkets over bread or milk for their kids. Lebanon is the poorest, hungriest, and most politically unstable it has ever been. Robberies and violence are becoming routine. We're headed to a collapse that will be remembered in history books as a case study of how corrupt, evil, greedy, and hateful humans can get.     And then there's me. I've spent the last few months alone in my appartment because of lockdowns and the financial crisis, with no job, no foreign passport or any other way to get out of this hell hole, and nothing to do except watching netflix or playing video games when the electricity and internet connection allow it. I roll a joint the second I wake up because I don't think I can face this life sober for a single hour.       Millions of people around the world go through poverty, traumas and wars, but what kills me from the inside is remembering the life I had, and could have had. I was a regular kid from a regular family, had friends, went to school, and was about to live a normal life. Now I understand how valuable this is. Many of my friends managed to leave or had already left to study abroad before the crisis. The others I barely see anymore. I can't imagine what my parents are going through, raising me for all these years just for me to have my life taken away from me like that.  I have no one to open up to, which is why I'm writing on a new account.       Now I can't do anything other than being a spectator of my own existence and watch hell break loose from my window, holding on to the memory of the two decades of "normal life" I had. I guess I'll just continue to exist until I find the courage to get this over with, or until some other mega bomb goes off next to my home.       I beg you to enjoy every friend, family member, pet, every meal in a restaurant, every roadtrip, every party,  every exam, hour spent at work, every laughter, every argument, every fight, every kiss, and every drink as if they were the last you will ever have, because they might very well be.

cymbalta for adolescents i‚Äôm 19 and have been on cymbalta for almost 2 months. before that i was on prozac. a little back story, i was on prozac in college (i‚Äôm a freshman) but then we got kicked out of the dorms bc of corona and when i went home i was switched to cymbalta. i know corona sucks but i think it saved my life. if corona never happened, i would still be in the dorms and i would‚Äôve killed myself by now (as i had planned) but then i went home, was starting to do better, but then i got on cymbalta and now i‚Äôm trying to kill myself again. it‚Äôs not that i necessarily got less suicidal after moving back home, it‚Äôs that i decided i would wait to do till i moved back out so that my parents wouldn‚Äôt be the ones to find me. i don‚Äôt know if this has anything to do with the cymbalta but i‚Äôm now trying to kill myself at home even tho i told myself i wouldn‚Äôt cuz of my parents. idk if this is cuz of my cymbalta or just cuz i‚Äôm severely depressed. the thing is, either way, i will kill myself. i‚Äôve been firm on it for nearly 6 months. but i really don‚Äôt want to do it at home, so i wanna know if it‚Äôs the cymbalta that‚Äôs making me want to do it so i can stop taking it cuz like i said, i want to do it when i move out this fall so my parents don‚Äôt find me dead.

Severe hypochondriac/health anxiety sufferer I panic about the most rare diseases every day like rabies and cjd. I worry about rabies so much i have considered suicide to be free of my obsessive thoughts. I live in a country with only 3 domestic cases of rabies. So yesterday morning i woke up and walked to get breakfast and i saw my brother with a wound on his nose. I told him about it as it looked like he didn‚Äôt notice. He didnt care but i started worrying that a bat bit his nose while he was sleeping (we never saw a bat in our lives) and i found a sticky gum like thing thats white. Its really big and i stepped on it a couple times it feels like gum. So i convinced myself that it was saliva of a rabid animal who flew in. He didn‚Äôt worry at all. I later told him about my fears. He started panicking. I panicked too. I didnt really give a shit wether or not i had rabies because im going to kill myself soon but i REALLY didn‚Äôt want him to get rabies. He later moved on and forgot about the fear because Of how rare rabies is in My country and the extremely small posibility that a rabid animal could have flew in without causing damage. I really wish there were cameras in my house so i can see what happened. I wont kill myself until i 100% know he doesn‚Äôt have rabies.

Im just stuck Okay, Im really not the type to post this sort of stuff but I guess I just have to get it off my chest. I'm a 23M, and father of 2 girls. I'm from Aus, so there is alot of mental health support and I've seen multiple people. I'm about to see another phsyciatrist in a couple days to more properly diagnose what I'm going through and hopefully get me on the right medication. Now, what I'm trying to get to is, I'm not bothered anymore. I'm not bothered seeing anyone anymore, I'm not bothered trying to distract myself anymore, I'm not bothered trying to get better anymore. I have been going through depression for the last 5 years or so (I know it isn't long, but for me it's felt like my whole life). I feel like I'm ready to go, I feel like I'm not scared of death, if anything I feel like I embrace it. I want to end this pain that I go through every single day, but I can't. I can't bear to think that my two daughters will grow up without a dad, I can't bear to think that my partner won't have anyone to help with the kids, I can't bear to think that my widowed mum will be by herself. But it pisses me off soo much that I can't leave this terrible place because of them. I'm stuck here. I'm stuck living a life that I don't want to live. I just want to know what to do!! Everyone says just keep trying, it will get better, but it doesn't. And if it will, I can't wait anymore. I cant deal with this anymore. But I have to do. Even though everyday that I wake up I just feel closer and closer to suicide. I don't find joy in anything, everything I loved I no longer enjoy, going to beach houses, holidays, movies anything that a normal person would enjoy, I don't. I literally don't find joy in anything anymore. Well that's my rant done. Sorry for bothering anyone.

I feel like my wife hates me 27 NB (AMAB)  I love this woman with every fiber of my being. I'd do anything for her. Literally anything. But lately I've been extremely depressed and I feel like its such a bother for her to really be there for me. Its sending me spiralling hard. I feel like I don't have anyone to talk to.   She's my best friend but I feel like when I tell her how I'm feeling she thinks less of me. She hasn't wanted to spend time with me for a week and its leaving me feeling so isolated. I feel so alone with my already insane depression. It seems like a chore for her to tell me she loves me or she misses me. Its making me feel worthless. Unworthy of her love. Like I'm weak. Not man enough for her.   I want to scream. I want to feel something other than this. I want to be happy. I want to feel like I'm deserving of her love. Comfort. Understanding. I am supposed to be dead right now But I'm not.  May 11th. May 11th was the day. For the past few months, I've been looking forward to it. May 11th. The day I would finally leave. The day my struggles ended. The day I could finally have peace... I was 100% set on this decision. I was going to die  But my problems and struggles ended sooner. A week before my death, I received help. My loved ones showed me that I was loved, that I was worth it. An AskReddit thread showed me what people would be like once I was gone. I'd 100% recommend reading it if you are feeling suicidal  I scrapped all my goodbye notes, I got rid of everything and worked on myself. The day came last night, and I'll admit I was tempted. It would be easy to leave and kill myself like I had planned. But I forced myself to sleep, allowing myself to carry on for many more days.  **But every bad chapter of our lives is nothing but a parabola. It goes down and down and down, it gets worse and worse, and it might get worse tomorrow. But it'll hit the vertex eventually, and from then on it's always going up. Better and better, you'll feel free.** Keep fighting until that vertex. Once you get past that moment, you're free.  **Because every treacherous ocean will always have to hit the land eventually. So keep swimming through. Don't let yourself drown, because just a little longer and all your dreams can come true. You will live your dream life.**  Last night wasn't easy for me. I even learned that my ex left me because of another guy. So the emotions were extremely overwhelming, but I fought through it. Look at my old posts, and you'll see how beyond hope I was. I was so set on killing myself, and now, every day, I'm loving myself a little bit more.  There is a reason to keep living. There is a reason to keep going. You are beautiful. You are worth it. Keep on living and never give up on your life. I love you <3

I honestly can‚Äôt imagine liking my appearance (long vent) I never liked myself or thought I was pretty even when I was little. Back then I was mostly just indifferent to the way I looked, like I didn‚Äôt hate my appearance but I definitely didn‚Äôt love it. I do remember hating all my school pictures, and whenever I had to see my most recent one I‚Äôd look away because I disliked looking at myself. This was back when I was in about third grade I think.  Looking back, I don‚Äôt think I was pretty as a kid despite when people say. My family thinks I was a gorgeous baby and kid, but I really don‚Äôt see it. When I was in fifth grade there was a slideshow of all the kids in the grades‚Äô baby, kindgarten and current pictures at elementary school graduation, and I remember wincing when mine can up. I was ashamed that everyone had to see me as an ugly little kid.  As I‚Äôm writing this I realize how awful it sounds. Maybe there‚Äôs just no such thing as a good picture of me, but either way I‚Äôm not made for photos. Even when I was little I wasn‚Äôt.  I really don‚Äôt know how other people can look at themselves in the mirror and not hate what they see. I‚Äôm happy they all don‚Äôt have to go through what I do. Saying this makes me feel incredibly awful, because I‚Äôm not covered in scars (on my face or other easily visible body parts at least) and don‚Äôt have any disfigurements or anything. I just hate my skin, my face, my everything.  Everyday when I wake up and look in the mirror I can‚Äôt help but think about how unattractive I am. I constantly think about how no one would ever want me and how I‚Äôll never date anyone for several reasons, one of them being how much I dislike myself and my appearance. I think I‚Äôd be unfair to a potential boyfriend to have to date someone who hates themselves as much as I do, and that‚Äôs assuming someone would actually like me.  Two boys have liked me in the past, one in ninth grade and one a few weeks ago at a psych hospital. The one from ninth grade told me he liked me but not just because I was pretty, but for other reasons I forgot about. He was overall scary and extremely manipulative, so I took that with a grain of salt. The psych hospital guy was really nice and when I mentioned how unattractive I thought I was, he said that all the boys in the room would disagree. He ended up being manipulative as well and was scary too, and I‚Äôm never seeing him again anyways so I disregarded that statement.  I just don‚Äôt believe it when people call me pretty. I know that when you like a person they look more attractive to you and when you dislike someone they look uglier to you, so when my friends say how pretty I am I just remember that and think that must be the reason. Or they‚Äôre just being nice.  I know I‚Äôll never date anyone for a lot of reasons, like because I‚Äôm scared of boys/men, hate myself and how I look, have trauma, and am asexual and afraid of sex in general. I don‚Äôt think anyone would want me.  Sorry for being a bummer yet again, I just don‚Äôt know where else I could vent about this. I feel so incredibly bad about myself every day and wanted to get this out.

Kinda amazed I'm still around honestly. I'm 27, going to turn 28 in a few months. I've been depressed for as long as I can remember. When I was in elementary school I used to constantly wish I had never been born. I was convinced I'd kill myself by the time I was 16. Obviously, that didn't happen.  I've had ups and downs in my life, I had a period of maybe two years in college where I actually genuinely felt GOOD about my life and where it was headed. Then my depression and anxiety got worse again. Spent a week in a behavioral hospital. Got on meds. They took the edge off but I never got back to that positive space. I wasn't miserable though, so they did their job.  Fast forward to last year, my dad killed himself in February. It came out of nowhere. Not gonna get deep into it, but we never had a great relationship until we reconnected around 2018. It pretty much wrecked me. I'm still not "over it." I can't even handle thinking about him.  Literally the only reason I haven't killed myself is because of my mom. She has no other family and it would destroy her if I died, especially in that way. I will not do that to her. But, as it stands right now, I'm going to kill myself when she's gone. I've never admitted that to anyone but I need to get it off my chest.  I keep hoping that something will happen to make me want to stick around. That I'll find passion for something, get a good job, maybe a partner. You know, the usual things. But it's hard to even muster up the energy to do simple things like get out of bed and shower. It's also just. . . hard to plan for the future when you've spent your whole life thinking, "I'm going to kill myself one day."  Honestly I'm kinda just posting this to get it off my chest. I don't really delve too deeply into how shitty I feel with my mom or my friends because I don't want to burden them. They've all got their own mental illnesses to deal with and I don't want to add my own baggage.
I'm alone on my birthday for the fourth time in a row Fuck it all

I hate this, knowing nobody wants me. My best friend abandoned me, and I used to be mad, but now I get it. I deserved it. I deserved to be left behind. Fuck, I just wanna do everyone a favor and off myself tonight.

(TW) Suicide is sometimes rational, and I'm trying to honestly figure out if that's where I'm at I'm 22, I've been homeless and fleeing domestic violence for most of my adult life with severe chronic PTSD, eating disorders that I'm statistically pretty likely to die from before 30 and depressive-psychotic episodes which often come at the worst times and put me in increased danger or can cause me to (accidentally) hurt anyone who cared enough to stick around. I wake up most days at 4 am re-experiencing rape, and my day usually gets worse from there on out. I've tried EVERY treatment I could access, from years of hospitalizations (10+, mostly voluntary and ALL of them made it much worse) and way more medication than any person should take, to off the books treatments and therapists, psycho-analysis, massage, acupuncture and Chinese herbs, other herbs, self-medicating with fun herbs, seeing dieticians and nutritionists and holistic life couches, DBT, CBT, ACT, EMDR, all kinds of groups and programs, live-in programs, eating disorder residentials, endless outpatient clinics, case management, peer support, even psychedelic therapy, getting an emotional support animal, skydiving, learning to play the harp, traveling the continent multiple times and trying to create my own hospital alternatives.  I've literally done everything I have the power to do to try and recover inside and outside of the system, and most of these things haven't made a considerable difference or have actually made it actively worse (meds lol). No matter the case, I don't have the resources to keep trying and I just don't have the energy anymore either.    My life ending early is likely to be unavoidable anyway, and continuing to live this miserably when I know it's likely for nothing (that I'll never get to recover, feel lasting happiness or maintain healthy relationships), feels cruel to me, especially when I can't stay alive without re-experiencing severe trauma near-daily and putting myself at real risk to repeat that trauma regularly. I've come to think of myself as someone who might be granted ethical assisted suicide if that existed in this country for mental health concerns, despite my age.      So, I'm here writing this mostly, simply, because I don't have any person in my life I can tell this to (except, actually, my mom, who agrees with me and supports my decision to end my life). But I want to know if other people agree this is reasonable or not. It wouldn't necessarily change my mind, but I am trying to do the most rational thing and at this moment my mind is still kind of open.  If you actually took the time to read all of this, bless your soul. If you're here to troll me, idk what else I was expecting i guess

I'd choose the blue pill In this case, I deem the blue pill as living the lie. To be more specific, the dilemma this is about is wether or not you would choose to live in a simulated reality or not, if you know for a fact your life would be better there.  I have modified it a bit, if you could press a buttom to relive only great the moments of your life maybe even make some edits to make those moments better and forget the bad ones, and then die, believing this to be real and being truly content, never realising that you're a) about to die b) that all of it was a lie. Why would you ever not press it? It truly seems like the perfect answer to all of life's suffering.  I've considered looking into self-delusion as a means of achieving something similar. I've often tried to convince myself when attempting to end my life that whatever bad happened wasn't real and "create my own reality" so to speak, so that I could die content. Never quite worked out, probably is practically impossible :/

Chronically ill. Suicidal. Sorry this is kind of long. I just have a lot to say and nobody in real life will listen.   I‚Äôm chronically ill with, what my doctors call, a severe case of Ehlers-Danlos syndrome. All of my joints dislocate on a daily basis, sitting too long will cause fabrics to rip into my skin, standing up makes me blackout instantly and I hit my head regularly because of this, I can no longer walk and use a wheelchair to get around, I have a problem with literally all of my organs from this, and I‚Äôm constantly in pain. There is no cure for this shitty disease I was born with. As of this year, I can‚Äôt drive anymore without vomiting or falling asleep.   Since it‚Äôs gotten worse this past year, I‚Äôve been struggling in school. Since I have accommodations through my university‚Äôs Accessibility Resources, I have excused medical absences and no late penalty for assignments. However, all of my professors tell me to drop out since I haven‚Äôt been able to attend the last two weeks. Even before I got worse recently, they always keep trying to ask ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs wrong with me‚Äù and I‚Äôm not comfortable sharing that with them and it‚Äôs incredibly awkward. Additionally, they‚Äôd always call me out in class and say shit like ‚ÄúI know this makes you uncomfortable, [name],‚Äù or ‚ÄúWould this work for you? I know you can‚Äôt walk.‚Äù I don‚Äôt know if they‚Äôre actually trying to be helpful but they make me feel singled out in front of 30+ people. One professor even keeps trying to meet me outside of class to talk about my ‚Äúmedical issues.‚Äù Accessibility Resources is in the midst of dealing with all of those problems, since I can‚Äôt deal with this anymore myself but it‚Äôs going nowhere.   I‚Äôve been diagnosed with Major Depressive disorder with psychotic features. Another doctor says I‚Äôm probably autistic on top of that but I can‚Äôt afford testing, since my insurance generally only covers 1% for procedures. They covered $17 of my brother‚Äôs $15k sleep study. I see psychiatrists, therapists, rheumatologist, occupational and physical therapists, cardiologists, gastroenterologist, a connective tissue clinic, and neurologists. I‚Äôve been seeing these people, from three different hospitals, for years now. I‚Äôm just not getting better.   I‚Äôm going to have to drop out of college since I can‚Äôt get to my classes or do any of the work. I have to quit my job because I can‚Äôt get to work. However, this job is waiting to fully hire me (with benefits and better health insurance) when I get my degree, since I‚Äôm two semesters away from graduating. But I‚Äôm throwing that all away since I literally can‚Äôt leave my bed.   I‚Äôve always been suicidal since I was ten and was constantly in and out of psych inpatient units. Since 2010, I‚Äôve tried to kill myself 20 times. The last time I was in an inpatient unit (last year), one of the male nurses pressed his erection into my back, and I can barely go into hospitals anymore because I‚Äôm just terrified of male doctors and nurses now.   I‚Äôm on ten different medications for a myriad of reasons and none work as intended.   I don‚Äôt have any friends, at work or from school, so I don‚Äôt have anyone to talk to or get help from. I lost all of my friends within the last year because they‚Äôre ‚Äútired of being friends with someone as disabled as [me].‚Äù   Last time I called 911 for assistance, they tried to put me in an inpatient unit, but chose not to after explaining what happened last time and that I‚Äôm actively seeing doctors on a weekly basis.   I‚Äôm at a loss and feel permanently stuck.   When I drop out, I‚Äôll lose all of my scholarships and grants and won‚Äôt be able to even do part time. So college is pretty much over for me, even though it was my favorite thing to do.   I don‚Äôt plan on living much longer. I‚Äôm done. I can‚Äôt live like this anymore. I‚Äôm so emotionally, physically, and academically exhausted. I‚Äôm truly not meant to live normally in this world and I‚Äôm tired of trying. I haven‚Äôt left my bed in days and don‚Äôt have energy to eat or drink.   Thanks for reading this, if you did. Nobody bothers listening to me in real life, so I guess it‚Äôs nice posting how I feel here.   TL;DR: Can‚Äôt do anything because of physical illnesses, probably going to kill myself soon.

If you're thinking of suicide... Seriously think about it. Don't do it because you're sad or depressed. Take your emotions and others opinions and thoughts out of the equation. Take a good, long look at your life. At life itself. Match up how you fit into all of it, and seriously do a lot of reflection and conclusive analysis on your life. Take a truthful look at your life and be brutally honest with yourself about whether or not it's something that is working for you. Is it worth it to continue living? Have you done everything you could to try and create the type of life you want? What is the likelihood of your life changing for the better? What is the likelihood of life, itself, changing for the better? Really sit and ponder things like that. I'm amazed at the clarity that comes from doing this. So, please think deeply about it. Because, the right choice for you will come from within. And listen to the choice made, because that will be the right choice.

[Academic] Research into Suicide within the LGBTQ+ Community Social Awareness Project Survey (all welcome) Hello all! Below is a link to a survey created for my class's Social Awareness Project. It's a short and sweet, 8-question survey based around suicide in the LGBTQ+ community that takes less than a minute to complete. I ask that anyone who is willing to, please take this survey. It is primarily geared towards those within the LGBTQ+ community, but anyone may take it. The results will go a long way in the data collection for the project and with spreading awareness of suicide within our community.  Due to the sensitive nature of the subject matter, please feel free to stop the survey at any time, or to just simply not do it as well.   All results are completely anonymous.  Please do not hesitate to reach out to me if you wish to discuss the subject at hand, any of the questions, or if you need any help with the survey.  Help is always available 24/7 to anyone in suicidal crisis or emotional distress at 1-800-273-8255.

I dont know where else to post this This might be extremely rambling but I‚Äôm pouring out my soul here. This isn‚Äôt a cry for help, if all you‚Äôre going to do is tell me not to, please save your breath for someone else.     Let me preface this by saying I have battled depression from a very young age, around 8 I suffered many losses of friends and family. I just turned 24 so its been 16 years and, I have fought and fought for a very long time. Even as a small child my parents told me that I would say things like ‚ÄúI want to go home to my real family.‚Äù and ‚ÄúThat I didn‚Äôt belong here‚Äù This would freak them and other out as a 4-5 year old would talk about being tired of life already and wanting to see his real family. I have lived my entire life homesick. Im tired. Not the kind of exhaustion I once felt where I just wanted to sleep, but one that I feel in my very being. Sleep was once a respite but now it‚Äôs just as bad if not worse than being awake. It use to come in waves but for the past few years it‚Äôs been ever constant, I don‚Äôt even have a moment to catch my breath. Just being wears me out anymore, I find no joy in anything, hell I barely feel anything anymore, almost everything that once brought me joy feels like a chore. Writing is one of my last few joys in this world so here I am writing. I have done many things to try to combat the depression and suicidal thoughts. Ive gone to therapy, tried different medications, psychadelics, meditation, dropping everything and moving away to start over, changing professions, going back to school, surrounding myself with happier people, etc, etc. Im currently on my last leg, I‚Äôm trying some more natural remedies, more natural suppliments, helping others again as that always seemed to at least ease my suffering even if only by a small amount. Ive tried to adhere to the buddhist teachings that if I ease the suffering of others I will ease my own.       The intent of this isn‚Äôt to be a suicide note, but if you find this and I have in-fact killed myself at this point, I hope this might provide some insight into why. Im writing this for myself not for anyone else, I‚Äôm hoping writing it out will let me work through some of my issues. I have never once in my life felt like I belong, when I‚Äôm surrounded by friends and loved ones I feel the most alone. I feel as though I‚Äôm little more than an imposter and that they either don‚Äôt like me and are faking it, or that they don‚Äôt even really know me and care about little more than a facade. Logically I know that there are people who at the very least SEEM to love me. Family and friends tell me they‚Äôd miss me, but in all honesty I am hitting the point where I no longer care. They tell me I‚Äôm being selfish, but aren‚Äôt they being selfish by trying to make me stay here and suffer. When I‚Äôve done psychadelics such as DMT I swear on everything that I‚Äôve seen my real family, and that I know they‚Äôre waiting for me. It‚Äôs not that they want me to kill myself, they want to see me live a good life, the want me to succeed and be happy. But I truly believe I have seen what Is waiting for us on the other side and it is so much more beautiful than anything you could imagine. The only time I‚Äôve ever felt true unconditional love was with them.     I feel like little more than a burden to those around me. I had to move back in with my parents recently thank to losing my job and covid. And I feel like I‚Äôm just a little bitch who can‚Äôt even stand on his own right now.       I have several mental illnesses; depression, anxiety, ADHD, OCD, and these all make doing things more and more difficult to do. I know there are people out there that cope with these and to those I‚Äôm SO proud of you. Ive tried a multitude of treatments, every single one has let me feel better for a couple of weeks and then my symptoms get worse. Im more apathetic and nihilistic than I‚Äôve ever been in my enter life. I used to exercise very day, and this helped, but after an accident in which I broke both my legs, I‚Äôve been unable to even get started back. I can‚Äôt even motivate myself to go out for a fucking walk. Honestly it feels like the only thing that has kept me from shooting myself Is the fact id have to go into another room unlock my safe and drive off to shoot myself so that my parents won‚Äôt find my corpse in their house. Im literally to unmotivated to even kill myself right now.  Even in rare moments of bliss I always think, man i should just end it on a high note.  I don‚Äôt want to sit here and play the victim, and I‚Äôm sorry if this comes off like I‚Äôm throwing myself a pity party. I just need to vent and get this out, some people in my life know bits and pieces, but I can‚Äôt imagine telling anyone I know all of it, I‚Äôm worried they would just have me committed and I REALLY don‚Äôt want that. A few people have said they‚Äôd be sad if I do kill myself but they‚Äôd understand as they‚Äôve watched me suffer for years. I honestly don‚Äôt even know why I‚Äôm posting this I don‚Äôt know what I hope to achieve from it. Maybe just a release of some of these emotions I‚Äôve been bottling up.  All in all ive seen enough death in my life to know just how inconsequential I am.  Ive seen how my family and most people react to death, They might be sad for a few months, maybe a year or two, but then life happens.  You slowly forget about them, new people enter your life, you become too busy to focus on what once was.  You might remember them on their Bday or around the time they died,  but all in all you move on after a couple of decades i doubt anyone would even really remember me.

Recently turned 19, mentally I'm at an all time low Now I'd like to preface this by saying I don't really think I'd go through with it, but the thoughts are there and they're getting worse. I haven't fucking talked to any of my friends for a solid 2 weeks now with the exception of a girl who's arguably my best friend at this point. She was feeling sad because secretly she hooked up with another guy in our friend group after they've been talking for a while and now he told he doesn't really feel well with going through with the relationship because he's not feeling mentally there as well. I comforted her and everything went fine and all, and it really sort of grounded me from all these depressive thoughts I'm having.   Anyway, I'm a 19 year old dude who know nothing about fucking anything. Lol never thought I'd be typing that. I'm barely 5'7 with a good face and build and all, but my hair has been falling since 17 and my mental has been spiraling down the fucking drain since I found out via two assholes I used to be friends with teasing me about it on a camping trip. Obviously it's gotten worse and Idk wtf to do. nice segway, because another major issue I'm fucking dealing with is not knowing what TO DO. AT ALL. I'm 19, everyone's going to University here, and even though I got offers, I'm not sure I want to go into debt here in Canada for something I'm not entirely sure about/interested in. Now that's normal but it's so fucking hopeless. Nobody can tell me what to do or what to feel and they're all tired of it because it's all I bring up whenever they ask me if I'm alright or how I'm doing. Always the same shit. I'm rotting away.   I've never experienced anything. I'm just 19 but I already feel old as if my time has already passed. To maintain morale in high school, I just gamed, really. Never dated, never had any girls interested and it's not getting any better now since I'm out of school and deciding if I wanna go to Uni next year or not. My only option is goddamn tinder, as if I'm gonna have any luck there, as a short guy that's also balding for no reason whatsoever. I've never even gotten laid one time while all of my friends have basically. I just don't think I'm cut out for this.   I want to live, I really do but I can't. I don't know how to proceed, all I know is that I wanna have some sort of artistic legacy and I wanna be good at something. I've picked up a guitar but idk how to learn it myself. Meanwhile my physical prime is already ending whereas everyone else's is just starting. I'm short, balding and even though I go to the gym, I'm still alone and feeling more secluded every day as I sit inside with nothing to do except play games and think. It's just so fucking hard dealing with all this shit at this age when everyone else is too busy worrying about girls and whether or not to get shitfaced while I'm worrying about the sad reality that all of this shit I want to experience isn't coming for me. It's not a regular part of MY life all because of shit I can't control. I just fucking can't take this anymore. Idk what I'm gonna do but it's beginning to look a lot like suicide is really an option.

equal parts bitter rant/unsent letter. today is November 3rd. the day that for many reasons, i had planned on for my suicide.   this decision was made 3 months ago to the date. on September 3rd.  i was in an incredible amount of pain & needed a plan.   i decided that I‚Äôd find time to go to the beach. then return to my mother‚Äôs home where I‚Äôd do it.   there was pain. at that time.  over time the pain changed into vague apathy & a general dissociation from this existence.   early September was also the time i went into a deep isolation. stopped talking to everyone. in an attempt to protect myself.   i don‚Äôt really have anything to say. if i cared more, i would articulate all the ways i felt aggrieved. & maybe demand some kind of ramifications but. that doesn‚Äôt matter.  i‚Äôm not looking for sympathy. no one owes me anything.   i think that i want to communicate that there isn‚Äôt going to be a ‚Äúbetter‚Äù me. there‚Äôs some hopes that maybe if i go to therapy. something.   sometime in September i wrote, ‚Äòsomething inside me has died‚Äô & it isn‚Äôt coming back.   there‚Äôs nothing i am willing to work towards/to fix.   i am just patiently waiting for my next November 3rd.   i won‚Äôt set a date. so i feel flexible enough.  but i know it‚Äôs coming. i do not plan to live any longer than i already have - only to experience more pain.   i am wildly miserable now & i just cannot imagine things getting worse. & yet i know they will.   i am building up to the day that i will finally have the courage that sneakily eluded me today.

i was robbed of what was supposed to be my best years and i want to die because of it i learned from a young age not to trust people. since i was 9 i kept a strong guard up and have never let anyone get close to me. i stopped hanging out with friends outside of school once i entered high school, and even before then i rarely did it. if friends did happen to invite me out, i would cancel last minute out of fear of who knows what. now i'm a junior in high school and i have maybe 2 real friends and 5 or so ones i think just put up with me. none of them have asked me to hang out in the 3 years ive known them until last week. tonight was prom and i did not go because i hate my body and despise being seen in public. i cant remember most of my life before this point. i spent 6th-10th grade wishing i could die and purposely developing bad habits in hopes of killing myself "on accident." ive always wanted to learn an instrument but never did because i hated myself too much. i've sabotaged my own life and i had no clue. i was a fucking loser who just watched anime all day throughout elementary and middle school. i quit all my sports by the time i was 12. i thought escaping into fantasy would solve my problems but instead it just fucked up my grip on reality even more. my parents didnt see these as issues i needed help with, but rather things to scold me for. i wasn't listened to when i brought up my suicidal thoughts at 11 and i've been suffering alone ever since. now my mom is dead and im stuck with a dad who i think is disappointed in me. my grades were excellent before but now theyre only just above average because the stress of real life got to me. i watched my mom die of cancer for 3 years, how was i meant to function? Actively Suicidal Despite All Treatments I've had every single treatment under the sun.  I'm on SSRIs and two mood stabilizers. I've done CBT, DBT and traditional talk therapy. I don't drink or use anymore. I've got all the 'skills' and frameworks.   None of it helps.   I'm still suicidal every couple of days. I'm still making plans and figuring out my means. I'm still trying to figure out how to get my hands on a firearm, and if I can't do that, a noose or enough gasoline for self-immolation.      The sad truth is that when the cause of the pain is external (other people and their abusive or evil behavior) rather than internal (self-loathing), no amount of therapy is going to help. When your life is constantly under threat, when every day you are getting attacked or threatened with violence, sooner or later you just break.

I just wanna get it over with Preface, I have OCD, BPD, possible bipolar, major depression, anxiety, and I'm autistic which is fine other than people are awful to autistic people, and I'd be shocked if I didn't have PTSD.  I was raped a few months ago and some really close friends sided with the rapist, and now the rapist and siders have taken to social media to make out like I'm the abuser.  I recently made a post saying basically unfollow me and stay out of my life if you support these people and it made a bit of a ripple in the water because apparently someone was waiting around for me to fuck up and then blast it to my abusers.  It just hurts so much. Not being emotionally capable of sleeping in my own bed. Not being emotionally capable of sleeping. Panicking that he's in my bed when I wake up. The nightmares. The constant checking social media no matter how hard I try to stop. I've managed to avoid his page for awhile because it's set in my mind that if I see anything about me I'll lose it. I'm tired. I'm so tired. I have a couple plans and I'm not sure which one to go with. My quality of life is just so low I wake up and regret not killing myself earlier. I've been crying hysterically every day for the past few days. I haven't been able to make it thru my shifts at work and I think it might lead me to losing my job, which would suck not because I don't have financial support but because I have a difficult time holding down jobs in general and it makes finding a job difficult.  I'm afraid of living thru it but I'm also afraid of dying. I was thinking of hanging but I'm afraid because I don't want my ceiling fan to fall and fuck everything up. I also live in a city so I was thinking of jumping off a tall building but I don't wanna survive it, and I don't doubt that the people in said building of choice would immediately know what's up. Then there's OD, I have lithium clomipramine and abilify and I am trying to get trazodone for sleep, maybe I could just see what happens? But the one I think I'll end up going with is thru my car. I have a tiny car so I'm wondering if I could just ram it into concrete and die.  I've been writing a note when I can muster up the energy, basically just thanking everyone who's helped and who I love and addressing the issues which lead up to my death.  I just don't want anyone to think I wouldn't do it. I'm in so much pain. It feels like the pain only matters when people are worried about me, when people care. I'm so beyond suffering. I just wanna go.

Having no escape So before anyone says, no, I simply don't have any options. I live with a mom who has repeatedly sexually, physically, and verbally abused me both as a young boy and a verbally abuses me as an adult daily, i've been molested by two men, would get screamed at by my grandma and cousin and abused by teachers and students.  I was talking on the phone to my therapist about it and she felt baffled because I don't actually have options, I can't file for disability and the money would get stolen from me anyways, I can't go homeless, I can't rely on other family members, I have no friends, there are no programs that would accept me because i'm 19, so i'm too old for youth stuff unfortunately, i'm not in school, don't have a license, ID, my birth certificate. I'm a gay guy so the only thing I can think of is going into survival sex work since I can't get a job because of how cripplingly disabled I am by my mental health issues.  With all this being said I think it's time to end it, some people don't get the luck of the draw which I accept. I just want all this to calm down and my suffering to be non-existent, the only feasible way that seems to be the only inevitable route is dying. The only choice however is how long I wanna let myself live, if I wanna stay alive for a couple days then just end it or perhaps simply end it now, I already know if I take enough of my pills i'll go into cardiac arrest and then die, or simply have a swift heart attack and also die. I just wish life wasn't as unfair to people as it has been to me.

Journal 1 So many things I want to say but my mind is a ducking mess. Once again I have to sort through my thoughts just to find the words. So I can let go of this burden. I flip flop between someone in love with live to well this confused gentleman unable to speak his mind. I'm afraid one day I just might throw the towel. Fantasy I‚Äôve had this very specific fantasy for quite awhile now, even before my life was shit honestly, but lately I find myself imagining it and yearning for it more and more:   I have a very average day. Nothing really happens, good or bad. The most forgettable day possible. In the late afternoon I get in my car and just pick a direction and drive. It might be deep into a desert, or far into a forest, or up to the top of a mountain. Just somewhere far away from all other people, away from lights and sounds and ‚Äúthe world.‚Äù I roll to a stop at some point, I don‚Äôt even really notice that I‚Äôve done it but I‚Äôm just there alone wherever I‚Äôve gone. The windows are rolled down and I can hear the quietness all around. I just sit and escape into that subtle nothing for awhile. And as the sun goes below the horizon just before it gets too dark, I put on a specific playlist I‚Äôve made (I have it and listen to it a lot when I fantasize). I put a needle in my arm and give myself enough opiate to never wake up and I drift away right there and then. Not because I‚Äôm hurt, or sad, or angry.  Just because I want to.

I want to die. I have became even more depressed and in despair this year with the coronavirus and all of that.  I have been stuck alone in my abusive household for 8 months. I have been getting more trauma memory back that I previously had locked away. I've been abused, sexually assaulted as a child, sexually assaulted as a teen, bullied, almost murdered, treated poorly for being bisexual etc.  I don't have access to therapy and I am slipping.  I have severe PTSD and it's getting progressively worse. I am failing my classes because I am in this house.  I have been like this for almost 7 years now, trying to stay alive for no goddamn reason.  I want to get a knife and stab myself to death. There's really no reason anymore. I will always have this fucking horrifying trauma, I will always be mentally ill, I can't take care of myself or get out of bed, I can't get anywhere in life.

What‚Äôs the point? What‚Äôs the point in this life I ‚Äúlive‚Äù?  What‚Äôs the point in trying? Why do I still grudgingly get out of bed everyday? Why do I take another breath? Who actually cares?  Who would be sad? When will I actually want to live life? When should I say goodbye? Where in my heart or mind do I find the reason for being here?   I‚Äôm never good enough, I‚Äôm never enough in general. I‚Äôll always be an after thought. I like to compare myself to the prizes at the fair, I‚Äôll never be a choice but rather it feels like I‚Äôm more like a consultation prize you get just for playing. Why do I keep trying? I‚Äôd much rather just end it since I‚Äôm nothing and never will be.

I Just want to Die My name is Adam and i have been suicidal for as long as i can remember. It all started in school as a kid i was an awkward child in a small town, where you grow a reputation quickly, i was quickly known as the kid to stay away from if you want to be popular. I ended up not doing it thinking to myself, It must get better once school is over, that is what everyone keeps telling me they cant be lying right one day its going to get better. Then school ended with me never really having a friend in my life outside of my dog, never once having a sleep over or going to another kids house but i made it threw high school. Ontop of all that BS with just being a lonely piece of shit i have always been a failure when it comes to any kind of academics or skills that would lead to some kind of career, I am 26 years old and have never made over 10k a year, no kind of post secondary and no prospects to speak of what so ever. Still living with my mother and she wants me out more and more with each passing month, nothing saved to speak of, at this point i have moved on from the noose and i think about a cliff near my house and have decided when i do it it will be there as i imagine it being the least painful. To add some more shit ontop i am asexual or at least i think i am, as far as i can tell i have never been attracted to a man or women in my life time, never been on a date of course since i have never had a friend and everyday i just want to jump more, there is no enjoyment, no fun just dread of being a poor failure that will be homeless once my mom has had enough and has no chance as success in the future, the most successful future i can hope for is a trash apartment that i can pray i can afford on my cashier salary. I also just found out that I don't have a job anymore I was layed off for the winter and supposed to start again soon now I just found out they don't want me back so seems like just another reason to do it, when nothing good ever happens for you and it is just shit on shit on shit why keep going. I cannot stand the "I know things are hard now, but chin up, things will get better !" sentiment. For fuck's sake. Things just don't "get better", life circumstances don't just change. You have to make them, and if you can't you're fucked. Lots of people are fucked, with their back against a wall and no way out of dire situations. Either you can cope and use the tools available to change your life, or you can't. If you can't change things, you can choose to suffer or give up. A lot of people who suffer choose to suffer because they have faith that if they are patient and good the universe will reward them. The universe rewards no one, it's an indifferent system. People are only willing to suffer and sacrifice everyday if they meaningfully believe it would lead to a fulfilling, happy outcome. Once it becomes clear that this will not be the case, people become either give up or become delusional.

Is therapy worth it/How to find a therapist? Hi. I'm feeling a little nervous about posting here as I don't want anyone in my real life to find out but I thought this would be a good resource for me. If this post shouldn't go here let me know and I'll take it down.   I'm a first time mom to a 9 month old boy. I've had issues with depression and anxiety since middle school but I've always been able to manage it ok. A few years ago I started taking birth control pills to regulate my hormones which really helped my mental health a lot, so when I got married I just stayed on the pill for preventing pregnancy as well. It clearly didn't work for me, as I now have a 9 month old baby. Since giving birth I've struggled with PPD and PPA, and I needed to start taking some form of birth control again to prevent another pregnancy, but the pill messes with breastfeeding and failed last time so I couldn't do that and got the arm implant instead. I don't know if my current issues have to do with the new implant or just PPD/PPA or just because I haven't been able to take the pill anymore or what, but it's getting bad.   My mental health has declined so much in the last 9 months I feel like I'm not even the same person. It's getting constantly worse and worse every day to the point where I have saved and hidden the bottle of oxycontin they gave me after giving birth (they gave it to me due to complications I won't go into rn), in case I want to take them all at once and end it. I've taken them out of the bottle and just held them in my hand a few times, but I was too weak to go through with it. I know I have enough of them to kill me. I know my husband and son would be better off without me. My son is so young, he wouldn't remember me so he wouldn't truly feel the loss later in life. My husband is young (we're early 20s) and a wonderful man so he could easily find someone else, someone better. I'm toxic and treat him badly. I know he walks on eggshells, the smallest thing can set me off and I have these extreme mood swings, I feel like a crazy person but I can't stop. I completely break down all the time for literally any reason or sometimes no reason. I hate myself. I'm angry and frustrated constantly but I can't show it to my son, I have to make myself smile and play with him and meet his emotional needs, so then I have no energy left for my husband. I'm completely emotionally drained. At the end of every day at I just lay in bed exhausted but unable to sleep, wishing I was dead. I don't want to feel like this anymore, I don't want to feel anything. When I think about death it feels like peace, it gives me comfort. I just want to lay down and sleep and never wake up.   My husband has tried so hard to support me, he took over most of the household chores and is an equal parent when we're both home. I told him I was really struggling and even having some suicidal thoughts but I downplayed it. He begs me to see a therapist but he's scared to push me on it. He tells me all the time he appreciates me, and that he and my son need me. It just makes me feel worse. I've treated my husband so badly and he still is so gentle and caring. He deserves so much better and he'll never leave me and I can't leave him, I cant do this without him, so I should just make the choice for him and he'll be forced to move on and find someone better. He wants me to see a therapist so bad, he's scared and I hate seeing him like this i wish I just hadn't told him. I just can't do this I can't call anyone I can't ask for help I don't want to sit in a room and have someone tell me how shitty I am, I know how shitty I am and I don't need a therapist to tell me about it. what are they going to tell me that I don't already know? How do you even go about finding a therapist? I asked my doctor a couple years ago and she said I have to look into all the therapists in my area and find one that takes my insurance. That feels like an insurmountable hill. Not to mention that even if I find one I might not click with them and I've heard you have to meet several therapists before you find the right one for you I just would rather end it and have this all be over. I don't know what to say to my husband. I have to take my son in for his 9 month checkup in 6 days and they're going to make me fill out that fucking mental health form and I don't know what to do. I dont want to lie, I HATE lying with every fiber of my being, but if I fill it out accurately it'll set off the red flags and they'll have to ask me a bunch of questions and what if they decide I'm not fit to parent because I might kill myselfand  what if they take my son away? What if they call CPS and they try to take him away from me? I would rather die than lose my son. I don't know what to do and I know rhis post is too long and I'm so sorry about that I just don't have anyone to talk to and I don't know what to do and I feel like killing myself is the only option that makes sense.

I really just want to die I‚Äôve felt this way since I was 14, I‚Äôm 18 now. I had toxic friends who told me I couldn‚Äôt be depressed because my life is too good and it wasn‚Äôt possible, they berated me when I started isolating myself, telling me they were scared of me and that I was being a bitch. These people had been my friends for 3 years, I didn‚Äôt have anyone else because I was introverted and shy so I thought I had to stay with them or I‚Äôd have no one. My dad has always been emotionally manipulative and mentally abusive, I was terrified of being left on my own with him until age 12, he made me feel like I wasn‚Äôt worth anything unless I was good at school, which I wasn‚Äôt. I barely passed my GCSEs, I dropped out of A levels when we (the uk) went into the first lockdown because my head of sixth form told me I was just going to fail anyways. I‚Äôve had a string of toxic relationships, been sexually abused a few times. I made really good friendships in the last year but in a matter of weeks I lost all of them and now they all hate me (it was my fault, I made a mistake and I fucked up, I deserved it). I feel so alone and so fucking numb, most days I can‚Äôt get out of bed. I used to get so passionate about things, I used to love so so strongly, but now the only thing I really feel is despair. It‚Äôs like death has a rope tied around me and it‚Äôs slowly dragging me away from everything. I wouldn‚Äôt even care if it just pulled a bit fucking quicker. I‚Äôm not scared of death at all, I haven‚Äôt been for years; I tried to kill myself back in May, I really thought I was going to die and I wasn‚Äôt scared at all, I was relieved that I would finally be able to rest properly. Since then it‚Äôs just gotten worse and all I can think about is how beautiful it would be just to suddenly cease to exist, to finally be at peace. The only reason I haven‚Äôt is because I feel so selfish leaving my mum on her own, she loves me so much and I love her, I just wish she could understand how much pain I‚Äôm in all the time and how difficult it is just to be alive. Actually fuck that, I‚Äôm not alive, I haven‚Äôt been alive for months, I‚Äôm just existing in a world that didn‚Äôt anticipate me surviving this long. Living isn‚Äôt lying in bed crying your eyes out every night. Living isn‚Äôt smiling to everyone and doing such a good job of convincing them you‚Äôre okay after years of practice. Living isn‚Äôt getting up and going about my day in a trance, feeling so numb it‚Äôs as if I‚Äôm watching someone else live my life for me while I crouch in the corner of my mind, shivering and sobbing. The worst part is that I don‚Äôt want to live. I don‚Äôt want to be happy because it makes it so much worse when you go back down again, I don‚Äôt want to be happy because that means having people around and all I‚Äôll do is hurt them. I just wish there was a way to stop existing and make everyone forget I ever existed in the first place. I don‚Äôt want people to mourn for me because I want to die to stop hurting them. I wish people could see how much pain I‚Äôm in and how exhausted I am so that maybe they could understand even slightly why I felt I had to do it. I wish people could just be happy that I‚Äôd be at peace for the first time in so long. I just really really want to die.

‚ÄúIf you aren‚Äôt satisfied with how you are living life then change it.‚Äù But I don‚Äôt have the motivation or drive to change it and I see myself suffering no matter what happens but I can easily kill myself and be over with this as it seems like the better option. Is my suicide justified then? Why does the majority of people think that most suicides are not justified. They can justify a person kill themselves if they are suffering with immense physical pain that isn‚Äôt going to go away considering how many options they have tried to reduce the suffering but to no avail. But when a person kills themselves if they are suffering with immense emotional pain that isn‚Äôt going to go away considering how many options they have tried to reduce the suffering but to no avail, then people say the suicide isn‚Äôt justified.  Look, I‚Äôm only 20. But I‚Äôve been depressed since I was 10. I‚Äôm always complaining about how shit my life is. Sometimes I will try and change it for the better but I simply do not have the motivation and drive to make it consistent. The depression, dysthymia to be exact, always comes back and it comes back hard when I try and better myself. I am simply not enjoying life. I don‚Äôt see a life where I do enjoy it. People tell me not kill myself because I‚Äôm so young, there‚Äôs still a lot to do in life, and that it‚Äôs not worth it. Emotional spiraling I can sense Them.   Feelings.   For you might see Them as a gem,    but They jumble all my meanings.      I loathe Them.    Spiders.   With Their empty eyes, my soul condemn,    best at creeping upon us - skilled hiders.      Might be deeply terrified,    I just don't see a treasure full of insects to be worth the try.   Maybe your hazard seems justified,    but I'm just tired of getting attached only to get in bed and cry.      Every time I think of an infatuation,   I can feel spiders crawling from my esophagus down my tummy,   try to bend and wreck the pure and precious into a new creation,    devour the butterflies just because they looked so yummy.      Now that the fragile can no longer fly and feel,    the jewels - hidden under webs and corpses,    everything just feels surreal,    maybe it's just my fault cuz all I do is obsess.     Do you get it?    I yearn to stop.   I keep getting bit.    Every emotion is a hit.      I'm so down and beaten up.    I feel the venom in my veins.    I think I can pour my thoughts into a cup,    but no one's gonna want to drink my brains.     The taste, I imagine, is gonna be so bitter,    no particular smell,    just the essence of a quitter.   I think the only place I belong to is hell.      I just feel out of control.    I thought I hit rock bottom but alas,    I kept digging down that damned hole,    until I feel disconnected from my mass.      There's no progression ever.    I'm just stuck here.    Rotting in the pit forever,    white noise is all I hear.

My friend committed suicide two weeks ago. Two weeks ago I lost one of my closest friends to suicide. Usually I'm a guy who takes life in a very ordered manner: one hurdle over the next. I don't believe in wallowing in self pity or oversharing on the internet, but sheesh guys this is hard. People go on and on about how you shouldn't feel guilty about not being there, but the truth is that I can't feel anything else. I really do wish that I was in the same room to tell him "NO!". I wish I was there to hug him a last time. I wonder a lot if he thought about me ... was I not enough to make him stay?  I've never quite cried this much in my life and my entire world is collapsing into this burning hell on Earth. Everyday when I get up I can't send a stupid snap, share an unfunny history meme, or wonder about the future loudly. Who am I going to go to swim meets with? Who am I going to talk to to? All of a sudden, life is getting very real. Throughout this senior year, I've maintained a really good GPA and kept up with absolutely everything even through quarantine but honestly, I can't do this anymore. It's hurting me to think that life is going to move on.  I attended his funeral a week ago and listening to the pastor was disgusting. He was saying things like "he chose to leave". I do not believe that my best friend made the active choice to leave - he felt helpless and lonely - those are not the same thing. I will never believe that one thoughtfully considers the choice of killing themself.  I feel thrown off my path. It sucks to say this, but I'm going to have to prioritize my exams this spring over my mental health or anything else. And also, to hell with society about the stigma around mental health. You live in hell and make others walk through hell as well when you say us guys can't speak about our emotions. To hell with this rotten education system that requires 17 and 18 year olds to make choices about their 40 year-old selves.  I'm going to try to end by saying that it's going to kill me just the same when I have to graduate without him, listen to our favourite songs without him or get married and not have him be my best man. I'm getting ripped apart piece-by-piece everyday but I'm going to have to move forward with this pain. I need to hope that it hurts less in the future. I just need to get though my IB exams. I just need to make it to May.  I hope that if you've ever "*considered*" commiting suicide, you're being played by your own brain. Please do your loved ones a favour and go goddamn write, talk, scream your problems. Please. It hurts everyone. It is not worth it.

I hate everything about myself. So I‚Äôm 22, I have a year and a half left of school. I changed programs so all my friends have already graduated. From the outside it looks like I have it all. I‚Äôm a varsity athlete, executive director of three prominent student groups, an honours student, and I‚Äôm one of the supervisors at my job. People look up to me. I‚Äôm a trans rights activist. I‚Äôm a disability advocate. I‚Äôm a hard worker and I look like I persevere through things.   However, I don‚Äôt.   I‚Äôve posted before, my family is shit basically. That situation is still horrible. However in the span of 72 hours I‚Äôve needed to get glued back together in emerge twice, and I haven‚Äôt slept because I‚Äôm laying awake dissociating trying to not kill myself. Nothing feels real. I spend hours laying in one spot thinking about dying.   My friends left me when I became their boss at work, my partner just dumped me because I have too much going on, I‚Äôm broke and my solution to not having money is to be a sugar baby but I feel filthy because I‚Äôve been sexually assaulted and never dealt with the trauma, my ex from several years ago is saying I stabbed him (that never happened, he‚Äôs currently having a psychotic break. he sexually assaulted me and I dumped him. That was it), I was in ANOTHER car accident, and I failed a practical (frisbee, it‚Äôs a blow off course) because I was mourning the death of my friend who got hit by a car cycling in September. My bio mom told me she doesn‚Äôt want anything to do with my, my dad and step mom don‚Äôt want me if I‚Äôm trans (‚Äòyou‚Äôre a monster destroying our daughter‚Äô).   My life has always been hard. I‚Äôve been verbally, physically, and psychologically abused for much of it. I‚Äôve been sexually assaulted four times. I‚Äôm chronically ill with epilepsy, gastroparesis, and a rare blood disorder that has no cure and just destroys my body. My parents denied me access to doctors when I was a kid so my system is completely fucked up. I need surgery to repair some things and I just found that out. I keep pushing through but I‚Äôm so. So. Fucking. Tired. I can‚Äôt push through it anymore. My counsellor wanted to take me to the hospital yesterday but I managed to talk through things because I knew if I went to the hospital I couldn‚Äôt kill myself.   I took too many pills and I‚Äôm still alive. I got a little carried away with self harm and then didn‚Äôt treat it for a good hour hoping things would just end. I can‚Äôt do this anymore. I hate everything about myself. Nothing is good enough. I‚Äôm not good enough. I made a video saying goodbye. This isn‚Äôt my ex partner‚Äôs fault, even though it lines up with me being dumped (time wise). Did it affect things? yes. But it was more of a ‚Äòfinal straw‚Äô situation. I can‚Äôt bring myself to delete the video. I cant bring myself to think of the next 20 minutes let alone the next 24 hours.  My body and mind are a mess. My life is a rollercoaster I can‚Äôt get off of. I have nothing and no one. I already have someone who will take my pets when I die. I wish I could make things work. I‚Äôve tried so hard. But nothing helps. Everything always falls apart. Everything I touch breaks. I wreck everything. It feels like everything is out of my control; so I‚Äôm going to take back that control. I can control my life: whether I live or die. I know that if I die, everything will be better for everyone. Why push forward when there are so many reasons to give up. I just want to go to sleep and never wake up.   These thoughts are all disjointed, none of my sentences flow properly; probably because I can‚Äôt focus and also because I‚Äôm just letting out what pops into my mind. My fingers are flying across the keyboard desperately trying to convey my thoughts in a last ditch attempt to talk things through with myself. No one can save me but myself, and I know that.

I feel like an idiot for trying Last year a very traumatic event happened in my life, it was kind of the last drop that spilled the cup for me.   So I completely shut off. Stopped posting on social media. Only actually deleted one of them. But completely went radio silent, not interacting with people in any way. I didn't go out. Not like I was the one being invited all the time before so that wasn't hard. But I simply didn't go out unless for bare necessities. I did not leave my room except for eating or using the bathroom, that is next to my room anyway. (I have a lot of troubles with my family so in this case this was actually good for them, that I wasn't bothering them, genuily had a grasp of how much more they enjoyed being in the living room etc for example when I was not there "to bother"), I attempted but didn't go thru with it.  The only messages I got in that period were of 2 people who sent me posts, memes a couple of times but no actual message, I was reachable, didn't block anyone or anything at all.   I disappeared off people's lives for that period of months and no one cared at all.   I slowly came back, again, being the person who always talks to people first. Only told 2 people what had happened, and genuily felt really unsupported.   I have tried, genuily tried since but jesus I know plenty of people say how no one would miss them if they were gone but I genuily did not expect to actually apply to me. It could happen now, after that some people didn't even go back to talking to me so, I could disappear again, make it permanent and it will genuily not have an effect in people's lives in a negative manner, because it did not back then, I feel fucking stupid trying so hard every single day I am still holding on and for no good reason, I have nothing to look foward to. I'm just here and if anything bothering people's existance.

How does the afterlife affect your suicidal thoughts? I have suffered from sporadic suicidal thoughts and depression for about a year now. I'm a 22 y/o male living in a Scandinavian country. I don't belong to any particular religion. But I'm very spiritual. And I know for a fact (no matter how much one might try to convince me on the contrary) that if I should die ‚Äì there IS a afterlife. Nothing can change this truth of mine. I've been a firm believer in the hereafter and the spiritual nature of the human soul long before I ever knew was depression or suicidal idiation was.  Knowing life will continue, I would actually rather want to exit this life and move on the next one. But I know I shouldn't. And I also know it will never happen because I could never inflict this much emotional trauma on my poor unsuspecting and kind parents ‚Äì as well as other people in my life.  But still, I want to go back to "God" (or your understanding of the source) and have nothing more to do with this world of darkness, challenges and despair. What should I do? Can anybody relate?  Also, I am afraid I will become a sinner of sorts or a bad person later on in life (even though I'm actually very compassionate) and that scares the crap out of my because I fear I might suffer in the next life. I'm not a Christian though. And when I say "suffer in the next life" I'm not talking about Heaven or Hell. Much less burn in eternal flames. Suicide Survivor: My two cents First of all, I lost almost everyone I loved the most to untimely deaths in recent history. That includes the love of my life who died at 33, my father, several friends and family. I have attempted suicide so many times with full intention to carry it out and I never thought I‚Äôd say I‚Äôm grateful I‚Äôm alive.  I knew that covid would negatively affect people with depression, anxiety and suicidal ideations. I‚Äôve lost loved ones to suicide before, and last April was no exception.   I‚Äôve gone to funeral after funeral after funeral. Life doesn‚Äôt promise us anything except that one day it will be over, so until then why not stick it out?  I want to share a couple things that I hope will help some of you out there. My wish is that whoever is reading this will shed light.   ‚Ä¢ We tend to want to disappear in order to be found. We also can want to disappear from existence because we are tired and the burden gets beyond heavy. You‚Äôre more resilient than you think. There‚Äôs always someone out there you may not have met yet who has an open heart and hand to be there for you. Your life and existence is an unique as a fingerprint. It‚Äôs one thing to relate but be careful when you compare. Life isn‚Äôt a Competition as much as a lot of people make it out to be. Sometimes a lot of want to see if ‚Äúanyone cares‚Äù to find us....I‚Äôm telling you people do. Start with me because I do care about you...and I mean it.  ‚Ä¢ Why was I born? To make a difference for yourself and you have the power even in the smallest of ways to make a difference. I‚Äôve asked myself why the hell I had to be born. ‚ÄúWhy didn‚Äôt my mom abort me?‚Äù Crap like that. ‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt ask to be born.‚Äù Well, I‚Äôm here. I was given life for ME, and at the end of the day you were given life to allow yourself to enjoy. You can be there for people you care about, but you have to take time to look into what it really means to love yourself. Youtube has a lot of videos on self love. I know it seems like a dumb corny idea, but it‚Äôs worth giving yourself a fighting chance. You were born to go on a quest to experience more than just the lame and depressing situations we can feel stuck in. Reach out.   ‚Ä¢ The simple things in life can be more rewarding than you think. Mindfulness helps a ton. It may seem trivial, but as human beings the mind tends to be geared toward: instant gratification, quick fix, NEXT  Take time to actually taste the food and drink. Take time to focus on your body when you take deep breaths to relax. Meditation is underrated.  ‚Ä¢ Loneliness and longing for connection is normal. Amid this uncertain time, there are several platforms on cool new apps to meet new people. It may seem lame but you never know who you‚Äôre going to meet and connect with. You might actually enjoy yourself.   ‚Ä¢ We tend to have habits of thinking and cycles we revisit. The hardest part of breaking any habit is the beginning. Then it becomes easier and more rewarding, because the fruits of labor are.   ‚Ä¢ Allow yourself to be treated as if you were treating someone you love the most. We tend to negative self talk quite often and I‚Äôm telling you to cut that out immediately. We all have to keep ourselves in check but put down the bat. If you like to do art or sing because you like it even though you may feel like you‚Äôre not ‚Äúgood enough‚Äù, do it! Anyone can make art, and it‚Äôs so much healthier for the brain than people think. Don‚Äôt limit yourself. Don‚Äôt sell yourself short.   ‚Ä¢ Bad memories are part of life unfortunately, but there‚Äôs got to be at least one okay memory you have right? If you‚Äôre saying ‚Äúno‚Äù you‚Äôre lying to yourself. It‚Äôs okay, right now you feel like crap and it feels like everything absolutely 100% sucks....but give it a little time....you‚Äôll think of a good memory.....and perhaps (probably) there will be a good time in your future that you wouldn‚Äôt have imagined.  That‚Äôs all I have for now. Reading a lot of your entries from less than a half a day ago, I am praying more than anything you all hang on, and I‚Äôm here for anyone.

Sometimes I feel like my life is a cosmic joke. Keep in mind, I‚Äôve just come to terms with the fact that there is no god or after life. As a devout Christian, this has been tough!
